titleStmt.title: John Dormer of Ascot, Esq; appellant. The Honable Charles Bertie and Henry Bertie, Esqres, the children of the honable Peregrine Bertie, Esq; deceas'd, and the children of Henry Cane, Sen' Gent. deceas'd, respondents. The respondents case.
